description: Whether you're a gram-counting thru-hiker, a kitchen-sink backpacker, or a passionate dayhiker, the Trail Sender™ Short is light, comfortable, and durable enough for any trail traveler. Their lightest trail short that combines an athletic design with classic ripstop fabric, the Trail Sender also features plenty of pocket storage and an adjustable waist with internal drawcord for the perfect fit.
name: Mountain Hardwear Trail Sender Shorts - Mens
